entry.title: Taproot Activation Meeting Reminder: April 6th 19:00 UTC bitcoin/bitcoin-dev
entry.summary: In an email exchange, Russell O'Connor corrected a mistake made by Dave about Bitcoin's "$MIN_LOCKIN_TIME + $((10 * 2016)) minutes" activation scheme. Dave expressed his preference for a predictable activation date as it would benefit Bitcoin users and recommended infrastructure adjustments. However, he acknowledged that making the activation state machine more complicated may not be worth it, given the simplicity of the current height-based activation.
